wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Broadhurst (30 November 1888 – 9 May 1953) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. In a career spanning almost 20 years, he made almost 250 appearances in the Football League for five different clubs.

response: * Fred Broadhurst, a professional footballer played for Preston North End, Stockport County and Barrow in the early part of the 20th century.
